author: Sajad Amirsardari
comment: Settings doesn't stick in its application. And this watchface appears darker on watch than it's photos in play store
title: Settings

author: Nicky Balderston
comment: Good app but I would give it ***** if I had the option to put a widget for watch battery and date ect.
title: Good but needs improving.

author: Armen Karapetyan
comment: Like this watch face, new update works fine for me. Recommended for anyone who wants something unusual
title: Unusual watchface

author: Frank Hill
comment: The latest update changes the look of  the watch face in "sleep" mode. It is ugly! I am uninstalling it. Don't waste your money.
title: Latest update ruined the watch face
